message.content:
cs.CR, cs.SD, cs.HC, cs.SY, cs.SE

The paper focuses on a cyber-security threat of covertly turning headphones into a microphone, which falls under the category of computer security (cs.CR). The paper also discusses the technical background and susceptibility of most PCs and laptops, which could fall under the category of system and software engineering (cs.SD). The attack scenario and defensive countermeasures could fall under the category of human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and systems and control (cs.SY). Finally, the paper discusses the measurement of signal quality and effective distance, which could fall under the category of software engineering (cs.SE).
